definitions.title: pr.pl.m. & f.
definitions.body: = the more usual [[אֵלָּה]], these 1Ch 20:8; with art. [[הָאֵל]] Ge 19:8, Ge 19:25, Ge 26:3, Ge 26:4, Le 18:27, De 4:42, De 7:72, De 19:11. (Merely an orthogr. variation of [[אֵלָּה]], and doubtless pronounced similarly; the kindred dialects have in genl. a dissyllabic form: v. sub [[אֵלֶּה]]. Written similarly in Ph., e.g. CIS 3:22, 14:5, 93:3 ([[האל]]), but ZMG:1875, 240 (Neo-Punic) [[אלא]]; in Plaut. Poen. v. I. 9 transliterated ily; Schroed.:Ph. Gr. p. 81, 160, 286 ff.)
